vote.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire, develop, and own The Elms, a mixed-income, multifamily development to be located at 1710 Morrell Avenue (Project) and enter into a seventy-five-year lease agreement with 1710 Morrell Avenue, LLC or its affiliate, for the development of the Project - Estimated Revenue Foregone: General Fund $50,517.00 (15 Years of Estimated Taxes)
